item.description:
The Dance Club Singles Dances

We are a 30's plus singles dance held every Saturday
Night @ S.A.C. Park 438 Lake St., Shrewsbury, MA
01545. The dance lessons begin at 7 pm and the
dance begins at 8pm closing at 1 am.

Most nights we will have a DJ, playing top 40's from the
70's to today. Our collection includes everything from Motown
and the Blues to modern pop. Occasionally we will hire live
bands, give away door prizes, and offer other special events
that promote socializing.

We offer a complimentary, beginner friendly dance
lesson from 7 to 8pm before the dance begins each Sat. Night.
We will be teaching Swing, Salsa, Tango, The Cha Cha, etc...

Each week will be different.

COMPLIMENTARY DANCE LESSONS

SPOT LIGHT DANCE COMPETITIONS

DOOR PRIZES

MEET AND MAKE NEW FRIENDS

DANCE THE NIGHTS AWAY ON THE
AREAS LARGEST DANCE FLOOR


We offer a unique environment for singles to meet,
dance and just have fun. Our dances offer a certain
level of class and socializing you won't find in a night
club/meet market. Our customers dress to impress
and are out for a casual evening of dancing and
socializing, yet open to the possibility of finding
"THE ONE". We offer a safe and friendly atmosphere
for singles to meet. Most of all, we have all the
ingredients for a fun night out of the house. We
encourage everyone to dance any way they like and
enjoy themselves.

THE DANCE CLUB








DIRECTIONS

From 495 take the route 9 west exit and follow to Shrewsbury. Go
left onto Lake St. (@BORDERS BOOKS). Travel 1.4 miles and we
are on the right. Watch for the yellow sign.

From 290 take the route 9 east exit (Shrewsbury St.) and follow to
Shrewsbury. Go right onto Lake St. (@ BORDERS BOOKS.) Travel
1.4 miles and we are on the right. Watch for the yellow sign.

From Route 20 turn onto Lake St. and travel .5 miles and take
your second street on the right which is the continuation of Lake
St. and travel .4 miles and we are on the left right.
item.name: The Dance Club Singles Dances
